definition: a written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together and bound in covers.
exampleSentence: I am reading a very interesting book.

definition: move at a speed faster than a walk, never having both or all the feet on the ground at the same time.
exampleSentence: He likes to run in the park every morning.

definition: feeling or showing pleasure or contentment.
exampleSentence: The children were happy to receive presents.

definition: a piece of furniture with a flat top supported by one or more legs, providing a surface for working at, eating from, or placing things on.
exampleSentence: Please put the vase on the table.

definition: say something in order to convey information, an opinion, or a feeling.
pleasing the senses or mind aesthetically.

exampleSentence: She wants to create a new website.

definition: perceive the intended meaning of (words, a language, or a speaker).
sufficiently great or important to be worthy of attention; noteworthy.
exampleSentence: There has been a significant increase in sales.

definition: examine methodically and in detail the constitution or structure of (something, especially information), typically for purposes of explanation and interpretation.
exampleSentence: The scientists will analyze the data collected from the experiment.

definition: the reproductive structure found in flowering plants (plants of the division Angiospermae).
exampleSentence: She received a bouquet of beautiful flowers.

definition: move at a regular and fairly slow pace by lifting and setting down each foot in turn, never having both feet off the ground at once.
exampleSentence: They decided to take a walk in the woods.

definition: having or showing a friendly, generous, and considerate nature.
exampleSentence: It was very kind of you to help me.

definition: give one's attention to a sound.
exampleSentence: Please listen carefully to the instructions.

definition: arousing curiosity or interest; holding the attention.
grow or cause to grow and become more mature, advanced, or elaborate.
exampleSentence: The company plans to develop new software.
